org.trianacode.taskgraph.databus

Class LocalDataBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.taskgraph.databus.LocalDataBus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataBusInterface

    public class LocalDataBus
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataBusInterface
    Simple local implementation of datstore. Local objects are converted into a local URL which can be used to uniquely identify both the type of the data and the data itself. User: scmijt Date: Jul 23, 2010 Time: 3:15:41 PM To change this template use File | Settings | File Templates.
